short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hull University Buddy browser extension is a helpful tool for University of Hull students to use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension tailored towards use from a University of Hull student. Includes an in-browser task manager app as well as some website links that students may find useful.

Version 1.6.3

Any bugs, feedback or feature requests, don't hesitate to get in touch and email me at: louis.donaldson42@gmail.com
